chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is experiencing an issue as follows:
The phone turns off unexpectedly while the battery is at 50%, and it may restart on its own or I need to do so. After restarting, the battery shows 10%. The sound tends to malfunction when watching a video. It then recovers on its own.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to solve the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
